name: Shiki's Last Year
description:
Explore the steadily shrinking world of a master poet in this small piece of interactive fiction.

Repeated encounters with people and objects will reveal new insights. You might even uncover an actual Shiki haiku.

Created for the Isolation Bitsy Jam in March 2020.

Controls

  • ARROW KEYS: Move, interact.

Notes

  • Exits are more or less where you think they are, but are only one square large due to engine limitations. If you suspect there is an exit somewhere, continue moving along the row or column until you find it.
  • If you happen to encounter a bug, please let me know in the comments, and I will fix it as soon as I can.
